snippet: Ivy League athletic directors on Thursday rejected creating conference tournaments for the league's automatic bids to the N.C.A.A. men's and women's basketball tournaments.
abstract: Ivy League athletic directors on Thursday rejected creating conference tournaments for the league's automatic bids to the N.C.A.A. men's and women's basketball tournaments.

headline.main: Ivy League Rejects Idea for Conference Basketball Tournament
headline.print_headline: College Basketball: Ivy League Rejects Postseason Tournaments
